CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Best performance of the bulk - heterojunction solar cells with a power conversion efficiency of 5.05% was achieved with PIDT-C12NT as donor and (6,6)-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as acceptor , which can be attributed to its higher charge carrier mobility , the optimized interpenetrating network as well as enhanced absorption coefficient of photoactive layer with respect to the other two polymers.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. PIDT-C12NT
2. (6,6)-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the updated "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. PIDT-C12NT
2. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT-C12NT |
| PC71BM |

PV.content:

Paragraph: Best performance of the bulk - heterojunction solar cells with a power conversion efficiency of 5.05% was achieved with PIDT-C12NT as donor and (6,6)-phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as acceptor , which can be attributed to its higher charge carrier mobility , the optimized interpenetrating network as well as enhanced absorption coefficient of photoactive layer with respect to the other two polymers.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! To identify the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph, we need to look for the characteristics or attributes of the materials being discussed.

1. Power conversion efficiency: 5.05%
2. Charge carrier mobility: higher
3. Interpenetrating network: optimized
4. Absorption coefficient of photoactive layer: enhanced

These are the specific values or properties of the materials being discussed in the paragraph, and they can be used to compare or contrast the performance of different materials.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the updated "Property Value" entities in the paragraph:

1. Power conversion efficiency: 5.05%
2. Charge carrier mobility: higher
3. Absorption coefficient of photoactive layer: enhanced

These three entities clearly refer to the value of material properties and are relevant to comparing or contrasting the performance of different materials. The mention of "interpenetrating network" does not directly refer to a specific property value, so it has been removed.
